name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Brian THOMAS, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Brian THOMAS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of May, 2009, the order of the PCRA court is affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Fahy, 598 Pa. 584, 959 A.2d 312 (2008); Commonwealth v. Marshall, 596 Pa. 587, 947 A.2d 714, 720-22 (2008).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Billy Horatio Ñolas, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Brian Thomas.
Amy Zapp, Esq., Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
970 A.2d 425
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Brian THOMAS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 24, 2009.
Decided May 26, 2009.
Billy Horatio Ñolas, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Brian Thomas.
Amy Zapp, Esq., Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CASTILLE, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
